Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Sheridan/Agatite
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Broadway, Wilson and Sheridan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Broadway, Wilson and Sheridan due to street blockage near Sheridan/Agatite.

Allow extra travel time.
